physDesc.p: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 25 x 12, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (2) 46 x 82, (A) 8 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (3) 45 x 33, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 61 x 58, (A) 7 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (5) 38 x 73, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 20 x 42, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 35 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (8) 36 x 30, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (9) 30 x 56, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (10) 78 x 33, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (11) 76 x 10, (A) 14 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 81 x 33, (A) 11 lines, top margin, (B) traces of 13 lines, top margin, (13) 75 x 23, (A) 12 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 97 x 43, (A) 9 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 81 x 29, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank
